overview: When Lena and Mason suggest swapping partners with their friends Korra and Dante, the young couple have no idea what to expect. For Korra and Mason, its been a long time coming. Both of them have desired each other since college but for Dante and Lena, its a different story. Dante gets cold feet and feels intimidated by Mason, but Lena knows exactly what to do to change his mind. Janelle and her husband Lance host a dinner for their best friends Ryder and Pierce. The dinner goes smoothly, until Janelle propose a game of truth or dare. This friendly game heats up quickly when Lance asks his wife to tell them about the hot dream she had about Ryder. Janelle dares her husband to kiss her friend Ryder which gets the group excited and everything escalates from there.
title: TS Wife Swap 2
